p: The study was piloted for 6 months, from March to August 2019. The mode of data collection was through one-on-one interviews, public discussion, and observation. The interviews were conducted mostly in Yoruba (native) language. The respondents gave the native names of plants and showed the interviewers the available plant samples. Information on the questionnaires was supplied on the spot of interview, and several observations and discussions were conducted prior to completing and cross-checking of the information provided.
